title: Cosmic Quest
description: Text-based Scifi Video game using restful API.

title: Shelfie
description: An application that allows the user to create and maintain a collection of books that they have read, or wish to read in the future.

title: SVG Logo Maker
description: A command-line application that takes in user input to generate a logo and save it as an SVG file.

title: Personal Blog
description: Two-page website where users can input and veiw blog posts. It includes a content form, dynamically rendered blog posts, and a light/dark toggle mode.

title: Task Board
description: An application that allows users to manage and delete tasks.

title: Employee Tracker
description: A command-line application to manage a company's employee database.
